outline:
1. encampment, camp
    1. camp, place of encampment
    2. camp of armed host, army camp
    3. those who encamp, company, body of people
kjv_def: army, band, battle, camp, company, drove, host, tents.
strongs_def: an encampment (of travellers or troops); hence, an army, whether literal (of soldiers) or figurative (of dancers, angels, cattle, locusts, stars; or even the sacred courts)
